title: Apple sued over use of copyrighted books to train Apple Intelligence
description: Apple was hit with a lawsuit in California federal court by a pair of neuroscientists who say that the tech company misused thousands of copyrighted books to train its Apple Intelligence artificial intelligence model.

title: Prince Harry and Meghan push against predatory social media
description: Prince Harry and Meghan urged parents to stand against social media companies that they said lure children with predatory algorithms designed to exploit their data amid the “explosion of unregulated artificial intelligence.”
content:

title: Apple Moves To Replace John Giannandrea In Order To Revamp Apple Intelligence And Catch Up With Google And OpenAI

title: India’s Sovereign AI Model To Be Ready Before February Summit
description: The government on Friday said that India’s sovereign artificial intelligence (AI) model will be ready before the AI Impact Summit to be held in February.
content: New Delhi: The government on Friday said that India’s sovereign artificial intelligence (AI) model will be ready before the AI Impact Summit to be held in February. The government has scheduled a two-day India AI Impact Summit 2026 on February 19 and... [611 chars]

title: Applied Digital stock climbs 16% as AI demand fuels data center growth
description: The company expanded on its $7 billion lease agreement for artificial intelligence data centers with CoreWeave.
content:
Applied Digital shares jumped 16% on Friday after the company posted strong first-quarter revenue that was boosted by artificial intelligence data center demand, putting the stock up more than 350% for the year.
